definitions.definition: Of a compound , containing chlorine with a lower oxidation number than equivalent chloric compounds; especially having an oxidation number of 3.
Relating to, or resembling, the electronegative character of chlorine ; hence, electronegative; opposed to basylous or zincous .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) Of a compound , containing chlorine with a lower oxidation number than equivalent chloric compounds; especially having an oxidation number of 3.
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Relating to, or resembling, the electronegative character of chlorine ; hence, electronegative; opposed to basylous or zincous .
